content:
[START OF THE EXAMPLE]
The goal is at position 8, 6. Your current position is at position 5, 4. There are walls above you, below you.

Thought: The goal is at position (8, 6) and my current position is (5, 4). I cannot move up or down due to walls. Therefore, I need to move left or right. To get closer to the goal, I should move right because the goal is further to the right in the 6th column.

Action: move right
Observation: The goal is at position 8, 6. Your current position is at position 5, 5. There are walls above you, below you.

Thought: The goal is at position (8, 6) and my current position is (5, 5). I cannot move up or down due to walls. To get closer to the goal, I should move right because the goal is further to the right in the 6th column.

Action: move right
Observation: The goal is at position 8, 6. Your current position is at position 5, 6. There is a wall above you.

Thought: The goal is at position (8, 6) and my current position is (5, 6). The goal is directly below me in the same column. Since there is a wall above me, I can only move down to approach the goal.

Action: move down
Observation: The goal is at position 8, 6. Your current position is at position 6, 6. There are walls to your right, to your left.

Thought: The goal is at position (8, 6) and my current position is (6, 6). I cannot move left or right due to walls. To get closer to the goal, I should continue moving down since the goal is directly below me.

Action: move down
Observation: The goal is at position 8, 6. Your current position is at position 7, 6. There are walls to your right, to your left.

Thought: The goal is at position (8, 6) and my current position is (7, 6). I cannot move left or right due to walls. The goal is directly below me, so I will move down to reach it.

Action: move down
